segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see the sink overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's just wasting away, pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The poor woman doesn't even know, focused on her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so calm, but trouble's brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's up on that unstable stool, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister waits eagerly, but this feels wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids being kids, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets will be damaged, and the floor slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them before an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunny garden outside seems so far from this worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene turned tense makes me melancholy.
segments.speaker: PAR
